    • Constructor Detail

      • SavedHttpAttachment

        public SavedHttpAttachment(java.lang.String name,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> attachmentData,
                           java.net.URI attachmentURI)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a SavedHttpAttachment (a fully initialised attachment) with the provided properties
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the attachment eg bonsai-boston.jpg
        attachmentData - The json attachment data from a couchDB instance
        attachmentURI - The URI at which the attachment can be downloaded
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error decoding the attachment data
